item.title: Pricing
item.description: Personal $29 / lifetime For personal use. Purchase Now For one developer GitHub support only Lifetime free updates Lifetime license Team $99 / lifetime For small teams. Purchase Now For upto 8 developers GitHub and email support Lifetime free updates Lifetime license Organization $199 / lifetime For large teams and organizations Purchase Now For unlimited developers GitHub, Email and Skype support Lifetime free updates Lifetime license Commercial OEM license If you want to include lightGallery as part of software developer kit (SDK), web application builder or website builder, downloadable or installable products like Wordpress themes, HTML templates,or something that produces copies that each use lightGallery, you need to choose the Commercial OEM license.
